sub_topic: The chaotic behavior of the double pendulum
message_1: What is the total swing time of a double pendulum consisting of two identical bobs each with a mass of 1kg and length of 1m, if the initial angle of the first pendulum is 20 degrees and the initial angle of the second pendulum is 30 degrees with respect to the equilibrium position? Assume the gravitational acceleration to be 9.81 m/s².
